alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A thunderstorm is producing strong outflow winds that will impact portions of south central Weld, northeastern Denver and western Adams Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over Lochbuie, or 22 miles northeast of Denver, moving southeast at 45 mph and producing strong outflow winds. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Aurora, northeastern Thornton, northeastern Commerce City, Brighton, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Fort Lupton, Lochbuie, Hudson, Barr Lake and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
